title: Statistical mechanics method helps machines better understand complex systems
description: A study by University of Hawaiʻi researchers is advancing how we learn the laws that govern complex systems—from predator-prey relationships to traffic patterns in cities to how populations grow and shift—using artificial intelligence (AI) and physics.

title: Saudi’s Humain to Open Data Centers With US Chips in Early 2026
description: Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, has broken ground on its first data centers in the kingdom and plans to have them up and running in early 2026 with the use of semiconductors imported from the US.
content:

title: AI-powered tool that identifies human sperm with fertilization potential boasts 96% accuracy
description: A research team from the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at the University of Hong Kong's LKS Faculty of Medicine (HKUMed) has developed the world's first artificial intelligence (AI) model that can accurately identify human sperm with fertilization potential. This breakthrough could reshape diagnosis and assisted reproductive treatments worldwide.

title: Elon Musk sues Apple, OpenAI in Texas over competition, App Store rankings
description: Elon Musk is accusing two tech giants of illegally conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence.
content:
Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI sued Apple and ChatGPT maker OpenAI in U.S. federal court in Texas on Monday, accusing them of illegally conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence.

title: Deeply inappropriate rumor about Jeff Bezos' mother sparks PR crisis for Google
description: Google's artificial intelligence promoted a fake story that rapper Eminem performed at Jeff Bezos's mother's funeral - and that Tesla CEO Elon Musk attended, Daily Mail can reveal.
content:
Google's artificial intelligence system is under fire after it promoted a fake story that rapper Eminem performed at Jeff Bezos's mother's funeral and that Tesla CEO Elon Musk attended, Daily Mail can reveal.

title: AI Can Reshape Half Of Roles In Indian Banking: Report
description: Amid concerns over artificial intelligence's impact on jobs, a consultancy firm on Monday said the adoption of the technology can 'reshape' half of the roles in the Indian banking sector. In what may come as a concerning outcome for banks, Boston Consulting Group said that despite a nearly five-times increase in information technology spending of banks over the last decade, the gains in productivity are limited.
content:

title: Google AI Search Tools Threaten Websites' Traffic
description: Financial Times reported that many website owners and publishers are concerned that Google's artificial intelligence search tools will lead to a dramatic decrease in traffic.
